messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] a comment about words and phrases (CHINA)
messages.msgSnippet: Meredith, My daughter and my cousin are both from China.  We were just there in January.  If I can offer anything to Mo let me know.  I d be only too pleased
messages.messageBody:
Meredith,
My daughter and my cousin are both from China. We were just there in
January. If I can offer anything to Mo let me know. I'd be only too
pleased to help.

Karen




On Thu, Oct 9, 2008 at 7:13 PM, Meredith <meredith@...> wrote:

>
> That doesn't necessarily mean travelling to China (Mo's current
> favorite wish) but it does mean looking for a hundred and one ways
> to meet her facination with China, even though if I dropped the
> matter after one issue of National Geographic and a new cartoon
> she'd probably be "satisfied". I know that she's not "full" yet.
>
> ---Meredith (Mo 7, Ray 15)
>
>
>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
